org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.scorecalc

Class AutoencoderScoreCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.scorecalc.base.BaseScoreCalculator<Model>
      • org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.scorecalc.AutoencoderScoreCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ScoreCalculator<Model>

    public class AutoencoderScoreCalculator
extends BaseScoreCalculator<Model>
    Score function for a MultiLayerNetwork or ComputationGraph with a single AutoEncoder layer. Calculates the specified RegressionEvaluation.Metric on the layer's reconstructions.
    Author:
    Alex Black
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • minimizeScore

        public boolean minimizeScore()
        Returns:
        If true: the score should be minimized. If false: the score should be maximized.
